citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:15 AM on
12/18/25.
The inspector arrived at 11:15 AM on 12/18/25 to conduct an inspection and contacted the authorized person. The
authorized person was about to leave the premises for an out-of-town appointment and would not return until later in the
afternoon. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility
representative available to accompany the inspector.
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:15 AM on 
12/18/25.  
 
The inspector arrived at 11:15 AM on 12/18/25 to conduct an inspection and contacted the authorized person. The 
authorized person was about to leave the premises for an out-of-town appointment and would not return until later in the 
afternoon. An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility 
representative available to accompany the inspector.  
 
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
